class.rdfs:comment: Any medical test, typically performed for diagnostic purposes.
class.rdfs:label: MedicalTest

schema:affectedBy.rdfs:comment: Drugs that affect the test's results.
schema:affectedBy.rdfs:label: affectedBy

schema:normalRange.rdfs:comment: Range of acceptable values for a typical patient, when applicable.
schema:normalRange.rdfs:label: normalRange

schema:signDetected.rdfs:comment: A sign detected by the test.
schema:signDetected.rdfs:label: signDetected

schema:usedToDiagnose.rdfs:comment: A condition the test is used to diagnose.
schema:usedToDiagnose.rdfs:label: usedToDiagnose

schema:usesDevice.rdfs:comment: Device used to perform the test.
schema:usesDevice.rdfs:label: usesDevice
